item.title: Work Beliefs
item.description:
• autonomy
    • take personal responsibility to be proactive and be the owner of implementation E2E
  • craftsmanship
    • never half-ass anything that ships
    • details and elegance matter for designing/building/operating solid systems
  • curiosity
    • best work is not defined but discovered under constraints and in context
  • deep dive
    • get to the root of problem and fix that
    • aim to better understand wider systems
  • pragmatic
    • strong ownership, but value stakeholder input
    • high level sense of urgency, but not hurried
    • some details matter than other - no bike shedding
    • know when to dive deep. weigh practise over academicy-ivory-tower theory
